title: Sommerfeld Enhancement from Background Force and the Galactic Center GeV Excess
summary: We study the impact of background-induced forces on dark matter (DM) annihilation and their implications for indirect detection. In the presence of a finite number density of background particles, loop-level interactions can generate an effective force that is significantly enhanced relative to the vacuum case.
